alert.note: Alert for Winnebago (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued February 02 at 10:07AM CST until February 03 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH FOR AN ICE JAM NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of north central Illinois, including the following area, Winnebago. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. Roads and streets may be flooded. Localized water level fluctuations possible due to an ice jam. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: A Flood Watch means flooding is possible, but not yet certain, based upon the latest forecasts. Persons with interests along area rivers, creeks, and other waterways should monitor the latest forecasts and be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
